title: Jack and the beanstalk
brief_description: A short version of the traditional fairy tale in a new medium of silhouette-color, in which black cut-out puppets are manipulated against a colored background. A recent variation on Lotte Reiniger’s established techniques. Narrated by Deryck Guyler.
